docs.snippet: Glenn Robinson III got a late bank shot to roll in as time expired Wednesday night, giving No. 16 Michigan a 77-76 overtime victory at Purdue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glenn Robinson III got a late bank shot to roll in as time expired Wednesday night, giving No. 16 Michigan a 77-76 overtime victory at Purdue.

headline.main: No. 16 Michigan Escapes Purdue With 77-76 OT Win
headline.print_headline: No. 16 Michigan Escapes Purdue With 77-76 OT Win

docs.snippet: Dmitry Balyasny’s hedge fund Balyasny Asset Management has hired three people who used to work for SAC Capital Advisors and, he said, would consider hiring more....

headline.main: A Hedge Fund Manager Says SAC Taint Is Manageable

docs.snippet: When red-state Democrats need a popular national leader in their corner, former President Bill Clinton is the man they call....
docs.lead_paragraph: When red-state Democrats need a popular national leader in their corner, former President Bill Clinton is the man they call.
docs.abstract: Democratic candidates facing competitive Senate races in red states are seeking support from Bill Clinton, who remains popular in the West and South where opposition to Pres Obama is common.

headline.main: Ex-President Ventures Where Some Might Not
headline.print_headline: Ex-President Ventures Where Some Might Not

docs.snippet: Thunder coach Scott Brooks joked during pregame that he didn't like what he saw from Kyrie Irving at the All-Star game. Brooks coached the West and watched as Irving led the East to a comeback win on his way to earning MVP honors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thunder coach Scott Brooks joked during pregame that he didn't like what he saw from Kyrie Irving at the All-Star game. Brooks coached the West and watched as Irving led the East to a comeback win on his way to earning MVP honors.

headline.main: Irving Scores 31, Leads Cavaliers Past Thunder
